name: expdcom
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wi(w2, w3)))
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), wi(w2, w3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wi(w2, w3)))
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), wi(w2, w3))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), wi(w2, w3))
-| wi(w2, wi(wa(w0, w1), w3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wi(w2, w3)))
-| wi(w2, wi(wa(w0, w1), w3))

comment: Commuted form of ~ expd . (Contributed by Alan Sare, 18-Mar-2012.) Shorten ~ expd . (Revised, 28-Jul-2022.)
